attributes.action: Make South Yard at HM Naval Base Devonport into an historical tourist atraction
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: South Yard at HM Naval Base Devonport could be turned into a tourist attraction similar to that at HM Naval Base Portsmouth. Such vessels as HMS Invincible could be preserved there and opened to the general public to show the history of the Royal Navy and RFA.
